VirtualHost:
ServerName [servername] ServerAlias [serveralias]
ErrorLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/error.log CustomLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/access.log combined
Alias /media [apppath]/media Alias /static [apppath]/home/static
Require all granted
WSGIDaemonProcess [processname] python-path=[apppath] python-home=[apppath]/[venv] WSGIProcessGroup [processname]
WSGIScriptAlias /[appname] [apppath]/meal_planner/wsgi.py process-group=[processname] # Below added to address issue at this link https://tinyurl.com/yc4drrrb WSGIApplicationGroup %{GLOBAL}
Require all granted
